label.description: A: Potential Customer Agrees to Meeting
D: Executive Sponsor confirms solution fit
F: Decision-makers confirms proposal meets all technical issues
I: Customer agrees to final pricing, Terms and Conditions and timeline before quarter end
B: Potential Customer Acknowledges business need & Softtek Fit
E: Executive Sponsor agrees to buying and selling activities
G: Decision-makers confirms proposal meets all business issues
C: Potential Customer confirms buying decision intention,timeline,and agrees to customer action plan
H: Executive Sponsor gives confirmation that Softtek is partner of choice
Totales del elemento de línea de producto
